attacks.name: Zzzap
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to each Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies (both yours and your opponent's). Don't apply Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Metallic Thunder
attacks.effect: You may discard 2 Metal Energy attached to Raichu. If you do, this attack's base damage is 90 instead of 50.
